taxonomicnotes: Hamilton (1822) described Cobitis pangia from Ganges.  Later the species was placed under the genus Pangio.  The species has been redescribed by Britz and Maclaine 2007.
rationale: Pangio pangia is a widespread species with no known major threats and hence placed under Least Concern.
evaluator: Rema Devi, K.R., Arunachalam, M., Dahanukar, N. & Daniel, B.A.
